meta.description: Determine the number of servings of vegetables and fruits to minimize cost while meeting nutritional requirements.

params.name: vitamins
params.description: Units of vitamins per serving of each food.

params.name: minerals
params.description: Units of minerals per serving of each food.

params.name: cost
params.description: Cost per serving of each food.

vars.name: servings
vars.description: Number of servings of each food.

objective.name: min_total_cost
objective.description: Minimize the total cost of servings.

constraints.name: vitamin_requirement
constraints.description: Ensure at least 20 units of vitamins are consumed.

constraints.name: mineral_requirement
constraints.description: Ensure at least 30 units of minerals are consumed.
